data.current_summary: Returns a list of air traffic reports.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve busiest flight travel periods and air traffic analytics
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves air traffic analytics data identifying the busiest traveling periods for flights. This operation analyzes historical and predictive traffic patterns to help identify peak travel times. Accepts parameters to filter by route, time period, or other traffic dimensions. Returns air traffic metrics including traveler volume, peak periods, and traffic intensity data. Useful for travel planning, capacity forecasting, and understanding seasonal travel patterns.
